video_prompt: Anime girl turns head to look over shoulder, hair sways. Jacket colors subtly shift. Background ribbons undulate and swirl. Scattered flowers subtly bloom and fade.
image_prompt: Stylish anime girl, light blue bob hair, wide blue eyes, large gold hoop earrings. Wearing abstract patterned white t-shirt, loose yellow-to-pink jacket with dark blue accents and white abstract patches, dark blue cargo pants, and colorful chunky sneakers. Standing with one foot forward, looking over shoulder. Vibrant, colorful background with pink, orange, yellow gradients, swirling blue/aqua/green ribbons forming heart-like shapes, and stylized orange flowers. Dynamic, youthful, urban streetwear aesthetic. Full body digital illustration.
refined_video_prompt: An anime girl's head smoothly rotates to peer over her shoulder, her hair gracefully swaying. Her jacket's colors subtly ebb and flow. Background ribbons rhythmically undulate and swirl, while scattered flowers continuously bloom and gently fade.
